quotes.quote: Good enough is never good enough, when extraordinary is expected and is the standard.
It is strange that only extraordinary men make the discoveries, which later appear so easy and simple.
There are no extraordinary men just extraordinary circumstances that ordinary men are forced to deal with.
When one man, for whatever reason, has the opportunity to lead an extraordinary life, he has no right to keep it to himself.
Extraordinary afflictions are not always the punishment of extraordinary sins, but sometimes the trial of extraordinary graces.
To find extraordinary things, go to the ordinary streets!
Extraordinary accomplishments are only achieved when we are able to overcome extraordinary challenges.
Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence.
We all have the extraordinary coded within us, waiting to be released.
The virtue of a man ought to be measured not by his extraordinary exertions, but by his every-day conduct.
Extraordinary allegations require extraordinary evidence.
You can only accomplish extraordinary things by involving excellent people who can do things that you cannot.
It takes an extraordinary intelligence to contemplate the obvious.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
To live an extraordinary life, you must resist an ordinary approach.
Extraordinary people visualize not what is possible or probable, but rather what is impossible. And by visualizing the impossible, they begin to see it as possible.
Sometimes the most ordinary things could be made extraordinary, simply by doin them with the right people.
Only an extraordinary person can turn opportunity into reality.
One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
Sometimes our light goes out but is blown into flame by another human being. Each of us owes deepest thanks to those who have rekindled this light.
Extraordinary rains pretty generally fall after great battles.
Behind extraordinary achievement you'll always discover extraordinary effort.
An extraordinary life is all about daily, continuous improvements in the areas that matter most.
The ordinary are here to fit into the world; the extraordinary are here to create their own worlds.
We must overcome the notion that we must be regular it robs you of the chance to be extraordinary and leads you to the mediocre.
Extraordinary moves of God begin with ordinary acts of obedience.
Extraordinary people survive under the most terrible circumstances and they become more extraordinary because of it.
Something extraordinary happens when you dramatically increase the focus, drive, and intention you bring to your life, work and relationships.
People do not decide to become extraordinary. They decide to accomplish extraordinary things.
One of the extraordinary things about human events is that the unthinkable becomes thinkable.
Extraordinary things are always hiding in places people never think to look.
The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them.
It is remarkable how quickly extraordinary things turn ordinary.
